1.3.name: wordpress/random-testimonials
1.3.description: With this plugin you have the ability to display a number of testimonials either in a page or post or as a widget on your sidebar. The amount displayed is determined by you. We also created a submission form that you can include in a post or page in order to have people submit their testimonials to you. User submitted testimonials are added to a queue in your Wordpress Admin for your approval.
